entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
